title: Should I record AVCON?
body:
I'm going to AVCON, but I have shitty sports camera. (Trying to get a better one)
Should I record my AVCON adventures, for those of you who have school and stuff.
Or who just don't know anything about it?

replies.body: Sounds like it'll be a fun watch, thought i know (almost) nothing about it xD
Seems like a really cool vlog type of thing you could do, go for it!

Well you cant go right? 
And you have no idea what its like, so I thought it would be a cool thing to do.

Now something I don't know what to do, Show my face.
Ask everyone in the club, I don't intend to show my face ever in my works.

But if its a vlog I might do so.
I don't want to mix My YouTuber/online persona with the real life me.
Honestly it's completely up to you, I wouldn't mind either way it probably wouldn't effect the vlog much

To see, or not to see my ugly face?
Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm.
